title: Ian Blackford – 2022 Comments on Boris Johnson Being on Holiday
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Ian Blackford, the SNP Leader at Westminster, on Twitter on 22 October 2022.
content: So this is Boris Johnson coming back from holiday two weeks after Parliament has returned. MPs are entitled to a break but during recess. His constituents have not been represented in Parliament over the last two weeks. This is who he is. It is about him, not about public service.
